FIELD.NAME: C2CX-SUBTYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Identifies the type of information being transferred between the Components

FIELD.NAME: NUM-OF-DEVICES
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of devices being reported in this message

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-START
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the start of an array of object fields

FIELD.NAME: DEVICE.n.NUMBER
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A number assigned to the device to distinguish it from identical devices.

FIELD.NAME: DEVICE.n.VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Version of the firmware operating within the device.

FIELD.NAME: DEVICE.n.ROLE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Role the device has, if known

FIELD.NAME: DEVICE.n.STATUS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates the condition of the device being reported. The reporting component may choose the condition level based on its own criteria.

FIELD.NAME: DEVICE.n.INFO
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An additional status code that can be supplied that is specific to that device.

FIELD.NAME: DEVICE.n.NUM-OF-PARAMS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of additional parameters being reported that are associated with the device.

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-START
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the start of an array of object fields

FIELD.NAME: DEVICE.n.PARAM.m.VALUE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Value of the named parameter being reported. Component must ascertain the data type before accessing the value (e.g. with a function call). Of type 'Variable' in the GMSEC ISD.

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-END
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the end of an array of object fields

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-END
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the end of an array of object fields
